# gamefabric_image (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `branch` (String) The branch in which to find the image.
- `image` (String) The name of the container image.
- `tag` (String) The tag or version of the container image.

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) The unique image name within its branch.
